mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, COL_SNO, COL_PNM, ANA_VAR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, COL_SNO, COL_PNM, ANA_VAR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(COL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
INSERT INTO WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL
UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,
CRE_COMP_ID,
COL_SNO,
COL_PNM,
COL_LNM,
ANA_VAR_ID,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{colSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{colLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, 'C', #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now()
mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL
COL_PNM = #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_LNM = #{colLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANA_VAR_ID = #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COL_SNO = #{colSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ANA_DASE_ID , A.ANA_DASE_NM , B.COL_PNM AS COL_PNM , B.COL_LNM AS COL_LNM , B.ANA_VAR_ID , E.DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN D.COL_PNM IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IBS_CHECK FROM WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL B ON B.ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV C ON C.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND C.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL D ON D.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = C.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND D.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.COL_PNM = B.COL_PNM AND B.ANA_VAR_ID = D.ANA_VAR_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_ANA_VAR E ON E.ANL_VAR_ID = B.ANA_VAR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY B.ANA_COL_SNO

SELECT C.ANA_DASE_NM AS SRC_ANA_DASE_NM , D.ANA_DASE_NM , B.COL_PNM , B.COL_LNM FROM WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV A LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.CRE_COMP_ID = A.CRE_COMP_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE C ON C.ANA_DASE_ID = A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE D ON D.ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
